description: [The Conversation Africa] A large clinical trial in South Africa and Uganda has shown that a twice-yearly injection of a new pre-exposure prophylaxis drug gives young women total protection from HIV infection.
title: Africa: HIV Breakthrough - Drug Trial Shows Injection Twice a Year Is 100 Percent Effective Against Infection

description: [African Arguments] Referred to as 'Marlians' after British-Nigerian singer, Naira Marley, whose songs allegedly glorify the profane, they have become the face of a silent crisis in the wake of the insurgency.
title: Africa: The Drug Menace in the Heartland of the Boko Haram Insurgency

description: [Capital FM] Nairobi -- Kenya has been ranked the sixth-most crypto-friendly country in Africa, with 5.1 percent of the population holding crypto.
title: Africa: Kenya Ranked Sixth Crypto-Friendly Country in Africa

description: [African Arguments] In the face of some nations' foot-dragging tactics, a pan-African front is all the more imperative, writes the chair of the African Group of Negotiators.
title: Africa: A United Africa Is Now the Only Path to the Climate Justice
